languages.text: {n}Некоторое время Ирлиэт медлит и молча наблюдает за вами из-под прикрытых век.{/n} "Теперь, когда мы поделились друг с другом своей истиной об этом мире... Мне интересно узнать, отличаются ли твои мысли обо мне, элантах, от мыслей твоих собратьев".

{n}Yrliet says nothing for a time, silently watching you from under her half-lowered lids.{/n} "Now that we have each shared our truth about this world... I would like to know if your thoughts about me align with those of your kin, elantach, or if you see me differently."
languages.original_text: {n}Некоторое время Ирлиэт медлит и молча наблюдает за вами из-под прикрытых век.{/n} "Теперь, когда мы поделились друг с другом своей истиной об этом мире... Мне интересно узнать, отличаются ли твои мысли обо мне, элантах, от мыслей твоих собратьев".

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet says nothing for a time, silently watching you from under her half-lowered lids.{/n} "Now that we have each shared our truth about this world... I would like to know if your thoughts about me align with those of your kin, elantach, or if you see me differently."

{n}Yrliet says nothing for a time, silently watching you from under her half-lowered lids.{/n} "Now that we have each shared our truth about this world... I would like to know if your thoughts about me align with those of your kin, elantach, or if you see me differently."

{n}Yrliet says nothing for a time, silently watching you from under her half-lowered lids.{/n} "Now that we have each shared our truth about this world... I would like to know if your thoughts about me align with those of your kin, elantach, or if you see me differently."

{n}Yrliet says nothing for a time, silently watching you from under her half-lowered lids.{/n} "Now that we have each shared our truth about this world... I would like to know if your thoughts about me align with those of your kin, elantach, or if you see me differently."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet guarda silencio durante un rato, observándote con los ojos entrecerrados.{/n} «Ahora que ambos hemos compartido nuestra verdad sobre este mundo... me gustaría saber si piensas lo mismo de mí que el resto de tu especie, elantach, o si me ves con distintos ojos».
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet says nothing for a time, silently watching you from under her half-lowered lids.{/n} "Now that we have each shared our truth about this world... I would like to know if your thoughts about me align with those of your kin, elantach, or if you see me differently."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet guarda silencio durante un rato, observándote con los ojos entrecerrados.{/n} «Ahora que ambos hemos compartido nuestra verdad sobre este mundo... me gustaría saber si piensas lo mismo de mí que el resto de tu especie, elantach, o si me ves con distintos ojos».

languages.text: {n}ユリエットはしばし口を開かず、まぶたを半ば伏せつつ静かにこちらを見つめている。{/n}「この世界についてのお互いの本音を話し合えた今…エランタ、お前は我に対して自分の血族と同じように感じているのか、それとも違う見方をしているのかを知りたいのだ」
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet says nothing for a time, silently watching you from under her half-lowered lids.{/n} "Now that we have each shared our truth about this world... I would like to know if your thoughts about me align with those of your kin, elantach, or if you see me differently."

traits.locale_text: {n}ユリエットはしばし口を開かず、まぶたを半ば伏せつつ静かにこちらを見つめている。{/n}「この世界についてのお互いの本音を話し合えた今…エランタ、お前は我に対して自分の血族と同じように感じているのか、それとも違う見方をしているのかを知りたいのだ」

languages.text: {n}伊莉耶特犹豫片刻，从半垂的眼睫下沉默地看着你。{/n}“既然我们已经交换过对这个世界的看法……我想知道，你对我的看法，是否与你的其他同类一致？或者说，是否有些不同？”
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet says nothing for a time, silently watching you from under her half-lowered lids.{/n} "Now that we have each shared our truth about this world... I would like to know if your thoughts about me align with those of your kin, elantach, or if you see me differently."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊莉耶特犹豫片刻，从半垂的眼睫下沉默地看着你。{/n}“既然我们已经交换过对这个世界的看法……我想知道，你对我的看法，是否与你的其他同类一致？或者说，是否有些不同？”

languages.text: {n}Yrliet demeure silencieuse un moment en vous observant de ses yeux mi-clos.{/n} « Maintenant que nous avons partagé nos vérités respectives sur ce monde... j'aimerais savoir si ce que vous pensez de moi s'accorde avec l'opinion de vos semblables, ou si vous me voyez différemment. »
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet says nothing for a time, silently watching you from under her half-lowered lids.{/n} "Now that we have each shared our truth about this world... I would like to know if your thoughts about me align with those of your kin, elantach, or if you see me differently."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet demeure silencieuse un moment en vous observant de ses yeux mi-clos.{/n} « Maintenant que nous avons partagé nos vérités respectives sur ce monde... j'aimerais savoir si ce que vous pensez de moi s'accorde avec l'opinion de vos semblables, ou si vous me voyez différemment. »

languages.text: {n}Yrliet sagt eine Weile nichts, sondern beobachtet dich nur stumm aus halb geöffneten Augen heraus.{/n} "Da wir nun unsere jeweilige Wahrheit über diese Welt miteinander geteilt haben ... würde ich gerne wissen, ob Eure Meinung zu mir der Eurer Spezies entspricht, Elantach. Oder ob Ihr mich anders seht."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet says nothing for a time, silently watching you from under her half-lowered lids.{/n} "Now that we have each shared our truth about this world... I would like to know if your thoughts about me align with those of your kin, elantach, or if you see me differently."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet sagt eine Weile nichts, sondern beobachtet dich nur stumm aus halb geöffneten Augen heraus.{/n} "Da wir nun unsere jeweilige Wahrheit über diese Welt miteinander geteilt haben ... würde ich gerne wissen, ob Eure Meinung zu mir der Eurer Spezies entspricht, Elantach. Oder ob Ihr mich anders seht."

languages.text: {n}Yrliet, bir süre hiçbir şey söyleyip kısık gözleriyle seni izliyor.{/n} "İkimiz de bu dünyayla ilgili doğrularımızı paylaştığımıza göre... Benim hakkımdaki fikirlerinin soydaşlarınınkiyle aynı olup olmadığını, beni farklı görüp görmediğini merak ediyorum elantach."
languages.original_text: {n}Yrliet says nothing for a time, silently watching you from under her half-lowered lids.{/n} "Now that we have each shared our truth about this world... I would like to know if your thoughts about me align with those of your kin, elantach, or if you see me differently."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yrliet bir süre hiçbir şey söylemiyor, sessizce kısık gözleriyle seni izliyor.{/n} "İkimiz de bu dünyayla ilgili doğrularımızı paylaştığımıza göre... Benim hakkımdaki fikirlerinin soydaşlarınınkiyle aynı olup olmadığını merak ediyorum elantach. Ya da beni farklı görüp görmediğini."
